page.title: 12CHURCHFIELD HOUSE-COBHAM SY
page.content:
Churchfield House is the biggest old people's home under one roof in Europe. There are 100 furnished flats, single and double, on 3 floors, so at least 150 elderly people live there.
Each flat consists of a bedroom, bathroom, living room and kitchen. In the bedroom and bathroom are buttons which the old people can press if they need help from the warden.
There are guest flats for 50p per day and flats for disabled on the ground floor. On every floor there is a large lounge.
There are good facilities, such as hair-dressers, laundrette and library.
